video_prompt: Eiffel Tower's foliage and flowers continuously bloom and gently sway. Pink and red blossoms subtly burst open and close. Birds flutter and glide around the tower. Clouds drift across a bright sky, casting shifting light and shadows. Individual meadow flowers subtly unfurl their petals.
image_prompt: Vibrant vertical shot of the Eiffel Tower covered entirely in lush green foliage and blossoming pink and red flowers, rising from a meadow of pink daisy-like flowers. Bright, partly cloudy sky with a single white bird in flight. Soft, sunny lighting. Nature reclaiming a man-made marvel.
refined_video_prompt: Flowering foliage and blossoms continuously emerge, gently swaying around the Eiffel Tower. Pink and red petals subtly unfurl and retract. Birds actively flutter and gracefully glide around the structure. Clouds continually drift, casting dynamic light and shadow shifts across the sky. Individual meadow flowers subtly unfurl and gently sway.
